text: Bengal Chatkal Mazdoor Federation is a trade union of jute mill workers in West Bengal, India.Chakrabarty, Dipesh. Rethinking working class history: Bengal, 1890-1940. Princeton University Press, 2000, p. 127. The union is affiliated to the All India Central Council of Trade Unions. == References == Category:All India Central Council of Trade Unions Category:Trade unions of the West Bengal jute mills Category:Jute industry trade unions
title: Bengal Chatkal Mazdoor Federation
